publications.name: Clairvoyance  –  vision-impaired friendly assistive mobile device
publications.summary: This paper presents a wearable device with webcams, a Jetson TX2 board, and vibrators that helps visually impaired individuals navigate safely by predicting the trajectory of obstacles and providing directional feedback through vibration.

publications.name: Nonlinear Vibration and Bifurcations of a Bending-Twisting Rotor System
publications.publisher: International  Mechanical Engineering  Congress  and  Exposition (ASME 2024)
publications.summary: This paper presents an analytical study of the nonlinear vibrations and bifurcations in a bending-twisting rotor system, revealing the motion complexity and stability through eigenvalue analysis and frequency-amplitude characteristics, with results applicable to controlling the rotor under environmental noise.

publications.name: A Novel Model for Heart Beating Rhythms
publications.publisher: International  Mechanical Engineering  Congress  and  Exposition (ASME 2024)
publications.summary: This study presents an improved cardiac conduction system model, incorporating key pacemakers and heart muscles using modified van der Pol oscillators and Hindmarsh-Rose neuron systems. By simulating heart dynamics and predicting waveform bifurcations, the research offers new insights into the nonlinear behavior and stability of heartbeats.
